articles.title: Nvidia is reportedly testing tracking software as chip-smuggling rumors swirl
articles.description: A new software option could make it possible to see the approximate location of some of Nvidia's AI chips.
articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak

articles.title: You can now share live video with emergency services on Android
articles.description: This feature could help give emergency dispatchers context in circumstances like car accidents, fires, or medical crises.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: CEO of South Korean retail giant Coupang resigns after massive data breach
articles.description: The massive data breach at the South Korean retail giant Coupang affects more than half of the country's population.
articles.author: Zack Whittaker

articles.title: Spotify tests more personalized, AI-powered ‘Prompted Playlists’
articles.description: The playlists can factor in world knowledge, go back to your listening history from day one, and be refreshed daily or weekly.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Overview Energy wants to beam energy from space to existing solar farms
articles.description: The stealthy startup plans to use a network of satellites to harvest sunlight and send it to Earth using infrared lasers.
articles.author: Tim De Chant

articles.title: OSHA investigating new crane accident at SpaceX’s Starbase facility
articles.description: A subcontractor says he was crushed by a metal support, breaking his hip, knee, and tibia. He's suing SpaceX and the construction company that
articles.author: Sean O'Kane

articles.title: Marco Rubio bans Calibri font at State Department for being too DEI
articles.description: Calibri, which could make documents easier to read for the vision impaired, was apparently installed in 2023 by the department’s then-DEI office.
articles.author: Julie Bort

articles.title: YouTube TV to launch genre-based subscription plans in 2026
articles.description: The new packages will give consumers more flexibility over the content that they want to pay for. YouTube notes that users will still get access to
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Reddit is testing verification badges
articles.description: Verified users will actually be notable figures, not just people who paid for the checkmark.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: Google is testing AI-powered article overviews on select publications’ Google News pages
articles.description: By adding AI-powered article overviews, Google says users will get more context before they click through to read an article.
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Amazon changes how copyright protection is applied to Kindle Direct’s self-published e-books
articles.description: Amazon says it will allow authors to offer their DRM-free e-books in the EPUB and PDF formats through its self-publishing platform, Kindle Direct
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: ChatGPT is Apple’s most downloaded app of 2025 in the US
articles.description: This is ChatGPT's first year as the No. 1 app on the U.S. App Store by downloads.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Amazon now offers same-day delivery of perishable groceries in 2,300 US cities
articles.description: The e-commerce giant says it will expand the service to additional cities in 2026.
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Oboe raises $16 million from a16z for its AI-powered course-generation platform
articles.description: Oboe has raised $16 million in funding for its learning app. The company now lets users generate unlimited courses for free.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: Google launches managed MCP servers that let AI agents simply plug into its tools
articles.description: Google is rolling out managed MCP servers to make its services “agent-ready by design,” starting with Maps and BigQuery, aiming to simplify messy
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Unacademy’s founder says startup is now worth less than $500M, confirms M&A talks
articles.description: Unacademy's valuation has dropped by over 85% from its pandemic-era peak price tag of $3.5 billion, its founder said.
articles.author: Jagmeet Singh

articles.title: AI startup Tavus founder says users talk to its AI Santa ‘for hours’ per day
articles.description: Tavus has launched a new experience where you can chat with an AI Santa that asks personal questions and remembers your interests.
articles.author: Lauren Forristal

articles.title: CoreWeave CEO defends AI circular deals as ‘working together’
articles.description: The CEO of the AI data center provider, which has Nvidia as an investor and a supplier, described the environment as a "violent change" in demand.
articles.author: Lucas.ropek

articles.title: Unconventional AI confirms its massive  $475M seed round
articles.description: Led by Naveen Rao, the former head of AI at Databricks, the new hardware startup is valued at $4.5 billion.
articles.author: Marina Temkin

articles.title: Hinge CEO steps down to launch Overtone, an AI dating app
articles.description: Overtone is described as "an early-stage dating service focused on using AI and voice tools to help people connect in a more thoughtful and personal
articles.author: Amanda Silberling
